messages.message: Hey, in the case of having many classes in a project, the table headers are far above the class I'm testing. I think it would make more sense to move the headers (e.g. Net Pay) lower, or move the class to the top when testing with validations

Cc @Siya for results table — is it possible we want to redesign this even before we implement the solution accuracy stuff? We’ve also discussed with @Liam Callanan about how this existing design has been difficult to implement and doesn’t scale well
let me discuss this a bit more with the design team and get back to you cc @Jianqi Xing @Natasha

@Arjun in jianqi's new design each section is its own table, so the header is per section and not for the entire table.

for the second problem, design team is discussing with liam on monday to understand the concerns better.
